summary: The diff modifies the Hero component to use a new background image and removes the stats section. REQ-15 appears fully implemented. REQ-14 is partially implemented â€” the Hero component references 'hero-houseboat.dim_1920x1080.png' but the spec requires saving the image as 'hero-houseboat.png' (without the dimension suffix), and no evidence exists that the image file was actually added to frontend/public/assets/generated/.

missing_requirements.requirement: Save the uploaded houseboat image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-houseboat.png
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no new files were added (ADDED FILES: none). The image file at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-houseboat.png is not present in the diff. Additionally, the Hero component references 'hero-houseboat.dim_1920x1080.png' rather than the required 'hero-houseboat.png' filename.

hallucinated_features.description: The Hero component background image uses the filename 'hero-houseboat.dim_1920x1080.png' instead of the specified 'hero-houseboat.png'.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies the asset should be saved and referenced as 'hero-houseboat.png', but the implementation uses a different filename with a dimension suffix that was not requested.
